scripts.test:regression: bash -lc '(npm run -s dev >/tmp/jeskola-dev.log 2>&1 &) ; DEV_PID=$!; trap "kill $DEV_PID 2>/dev/null || true" EXIT; sleep 2; npm run -s test:preset-integrity && node test_toolbar_layout.js && node test_distortion_preset.js && node test_composed_preset_load.js && node test_stacked_builder.js && node test_recipe_load.js && node test_rapid_import_switch.js && node test_duplicate_id_import.js'
